title: Unable to open my Settings
body: I wanted to change my settings in the beginning of a game but I couldn't open it because my escape key didn't work (I probably unbinded a key with "esc") so I'm trying to find a way to fix it. I tried reinstalling league, hoping to reset my settings but I was sadly wrong.  Any suggestions?

replies.body: I believe that key is reserved and can't be changed per our [Keyboard  guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#wq2).  Are you able to troubleshoot a potential hardware problem by swapping it out for another keyboard?  Let me know what happens!
